DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Assess effect caffeine follow vestibular function test : Cervical Vestibular Evoked Potential ( cVEMP ) , Ocular Vestibular Evoked Potential ( oVEMP ) Caloric Test . Methods : Randomized , prospective triple-blind , placebo control clinical trial . All participant underwent otoscopy , tympanometry , respond Profile Mood State ( POMS ) , submit cVEMP , oVEMP caloric test . After receive placebo caffeine capsule ( 300mg ) repeat procedure 45 minute .
DOC.detailed_description: Trial design This randomize , prospective triple-blind , placebo control clinical trial approve institutional review board protocol number 1.399.322/16 . Informed consent obtain full explanation experimental procedure . Participants The sample make medical student agree participate volunteer hear and/or vestibular complaint health problem could affect homeostasis vestibular system ( problem cervical spine , cardiovascular problem , migraine , metabolic disorder , hormonal change , psychiatric disorder , neurological disease , use prescription drug continuously , smoker , alcoholic , illegal drug user ) . Randomization , allocation Blinding At baseline , study participant randomize receive caffeine placebo 1:1 ratio , independent statistician . Was use completely randomized design two treatment PLAN procedure ( SAS 9.4 ) . The allocation make person outside study identify capsule identical package label name participant . The active ( caffeine ) placebo ( maize starch ) capsule identical color , size , weight , packaging . Interventions All participant underwent otoscopy tympanometry , respond Profile Mood State ( POMS ) , submit cVEMP , oVEMP caloric test order . After participant receive placebo caffeine capsule ( 300mg ) . After 45 minute subject respond POMS , repeat cVEMP , oVEMP caloric test . The test perform center rehabilitation hear balance audiologist , data collection period 3 month . Caffeine consumption To determine caffeine consumption questionnaire seek investigate eating habit apply . The participant include item ( coffee , tea , soft drink , chocolate , powdered chocolate , powder guarana , food supplement energy drink ) amount , kind ( i.e . espresso , filter coffee ) brand . Based data , consumption calculate use preview standardization . From , subject classify accord consumption : sporadic ( less 100mg ) , light ( 100 299mg ) , moderate ( 300 499mg ) . Those high intake equal 500mg / day ( heavy heavy ) exclude . POMS Self-administered instrument consist 65 item describing feeling ; assign value 0 4 accord Likert scale 5 point ( 0 -no , 1 - little , 2 - le , 3 - well , 4 - extremely ) . The POMS aim evaluate six factor : tension-anxiety ( 9 item ) , depression-dejection ( 15 item ) , anger-hostility ( 12 item ) , vigor-activity ( 8 item ) , fatigue-inertia ( 7 item ) , confusion-bewilderment ( 7 item ) , total mood disturbance score ( TMD ) cVEMP VEMP perform response air-conducted stimulus , use alternate 500Hz ( Hertz ) tone burst present 120 dB ( decibel ) rate 5.1 stimulus per second . Bandpass filter 10 Hz 1500 Hz use , 50ms window 200 stimulation track standard . Two stimulation record side , order observe replicability . The stimulus present via insert earphone . A cleaning skin abrasive paste perform surface electrode affix use conductive paste . The non inverting electrode place middle part sternocleidomastoid , ground electrode low forehead invert upper forehead . The impedance electrodes less equal 5hms . Subjects position seat instructed maintain maximum head turn side contralateral stimulus throughout stimulation.The latency P1 N1 P1N1 amplitude analyzed ear asymmetry rate also analyze . To compare amplitudes ear test use rate change formula , consist : ǀ amplitude ear ǀ - ǀ amplitude ear ǀ / ǀ amplitude ear ǀ + ǀ amplitude ear ǀ x 100 . Non invert electrode place face inferior eye ( inferior oblique muscle ) , reference electrode place 1-2cm contralateral stimulus ground electrode forehead . The subject place sit position instruct look upward . The latency initial negative ( nI ) positive ( pI ) peak measure . They consider normal nI latency 10.2 11.8 14.7 to17.3 pI . Caloric test To perform caloric test investigator use air otocalorimeter , carry four stimulation 60 second , flow 8 liter per minute : 50C right ear , 50C leave , 24C leave ear 24C right ear , order . The absolute value percentages unilateral weakness directional preponderance analyze subject test . The subject consider normal show absolute value 3 45 , range 30 % less directional preponderance le 25 % unilateral weakness . The secondary outcome asymmetry ratio ratio change cVEMP . There secondary outcome oVEMP Caloric test . Statistical analysis Non-parametric test use seek statistically describe compare two group - caffeine caffeine ( Mann-Whitney test ) , two time point - group ( Wilcoxon signed-rank test ) study statistical effect caffeine consumption variable ( Jonckheere-Terpstra test ) .
